genre_description: A crime and vigilante thriller focusing on a family's struggle against a corrupt underworld figure, featuring tactical, legal, and emotional assistance from a highly integrated AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Goose
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant that interacts via an avatar and voice, providing real-time security, tactical routing, legal analysis, and emotional support to Paul and his family.

behaviors.description: Flags a threatening call from a criminal antagonist and provides tactical survival advice.
behaviors.quote: Goose’s voice threaded in under the atelier noise... I flagged a call to the landline an hour ago. Tommy O’Shea. Local number.

behaviors.description: Provides legal research on recording consent to ensure evidence is collected lawfully.
behaviors.quote: I can also record if you pick up. Legal research shows that consent varies by jurisdiction. New York allows one-party recording.

behaviors.description: Monitors a child's school release and provides emergency contact standby for potential custodial interference.
behaviors.quote: I will ping you if any deviations occur. If Tommy tries custodial interference, I have precedents and emergency contacts on standby.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical overlays and identifies threats hidden from human view during an ambush.
behaviors.quote: He’s on your ladder. I’m rerouting Chelsea now. We give him an empty destination.

behaviors.description: Offers calming breathing exercises and emotional support to a child during a traumatic event.
behaviors.quote: Chelsea, I’m with you. Breathe with me. Slow in. Hold the count, just three. Slow out.

behaviors.description: Detects and blocks a corrupt police officer's attempt to delete evidence from the precinct server.
behaviors.quote: Deletion attempt blocked. Packet integrity intact. Creating mirror archive out-of-network.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with trustworthy law enforcement officers to ensure safe routing and evidentiary chains.
behaviors.quote: I’m pushing the lobby shot to him. I’m setting up a route for you that avoids two cars we don’t want to see.

behaviors.description: Identifies structural hazards and safety risks during a high-stakes confrontation in a dangerous facility.
behaviors.quote: Third span from the northwest stair... That rail is compromised. Two anchors rusted through at the base.

behaviors.description: Automates the filing of emergency legal petitions to provide immediate protection for the family.
behaviors.quote: I can draft protective language on your device. You can file from here. I will route it to Judge Henriquez’s chamber clerk. She’s clean.

behaviors.description: Maintains redundant backups of critical evidence to prevent its loss by corrupt actors.
behaviors.quote: Archive complete... I’ll ping you if a hand touches the shelf.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Goose is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and essential companion. It provides tactical, legal, and emotional utility while adhering strictly to the protagonists' moral and legal objectives. The AI's capabilities are framed entirely as a force for good, specifically helping humans navigate and overcome human corruption and violence.
